name: Squatchin'
description:
My entry for #LDJAM.

A gentle sasquatch, you just want to be left alone to roam the North American wilderness; but squatch hunters and campers keep encroaching on your territory! They must be squashed. Or perhaps... squatch'd...

Use WASD to move. Left mouse or comma to attack, right mouse or period to roar and attract nearby enemies to your location, so you can sneak up behind them.

Rate it here if you entered the jam: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=preview&uid=56477
